03259               {
03260                 System.out.print(".");
03261                 System.out.flush();
03262

03264                   {
03265                     CUtility.ASSERT(false == dfa.m_mark);
03266                   }
03267

03269                 dfa.m_mark = true;
03270                 
03271                 /* Allocate new CDTrans, then initialize fields. */
03272                 dtrans = new CDTrans(m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size(),m_spec);
03273                 dtrans.m_accept = dfa.m_accept;
03274                 dtrans.m_anchor = dfa.m_anchor;
03275                 
03276                 /* Set CDTrans array for each character transition. */
03277                 for (i = 0; i < m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols; ++i)
03278                   {
03279                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03280                       {

03282                         CUtility.ASSERT(m_spec.m_dtrans_ncols > i);
03283                       }
03284                     
03285                     /* Create new dfa set by attempting character transition. */
03286                     move(dfa.m_nfa_set,dfa.m_nfa_bit,i,bunch);
03287                     if (null != bunch.m_nfa_set)
03288                       {
03289                         e_closure(bunch);
03290                       }
03291                     
03292                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03293                       {
03294                         CUtility.ASSERT((null == bunch.m_nfa_set 
03295                                          && null == bunch.m_nfa_bit)
03296                                         || (null != bunch.m_nfa_set 
03297                                             && null != bunch.m_nfa_bit));
03298                       }
03299                     
03300                     /* Create new state or set state to empty. */
03301                     if (null == bunch.m_nfa_set)
03302                       {
03303                         nextstate = CDTrans.F;
03304                       }
03305                     else 
03306                       {
03307                         nextstate = in_dstates(bunch);
03308                         
03309                         if (NOT_IN_DSTATES == nextstate)
03310                           {
03311                             nextstate = add_to_dstates(bunch);
03312                           }
03313                       }
03314                     
03315                     if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03316                       {
03317                         CUtility.ASSERT(nextstate < m_spec.m_dfa_states.size());
03318                       }
03319                     
03320                     dtrans.m_dtrans[i] = nextstate;
03321                   }
03322                 
03323                 if (CUtility.DEBUG)
03324                   {
03325                     CUtility.ASSERT(m_spec.m_dtrans_vector.size() == dfa.m_label);
03326                   }
03327

03329               }

03707         if (CUtility.OLD_DEBUG)
03708           {
03709             System.out.print("Looking for set : ");
03710             m_lexGen.print_set(bunch.m_nfa_set);
03711           }
03712 
03713         dfa = (CDfa) m_spec.m_dfa_sets.get(bunch.m_nfa_bit);
03714 
03715         if (null != dfa)
03716           {
03717             if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03718               {
03719                 System.out.println(" FOUND!");
03720               }
03721             
03722             return dfa.m_label;
03723           }
03724 
03725         if (CUtility.OLD_DUMP_DEBUG)
03726           {
03727             System.out.println(" NOT FOUND!");
03728           }
03729         return NOT_IN_DSTATES;
03730       }
